articles.description: Arsenal will not stop fighting for the Premier League title despite slipping 11 points behind leaders Liverpool, says Gunners boss Mikel Arteta.
articles.title: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta says club won't give up on Premier League title race

articles.description: Galatasaray said they would "initiate criminal proceedings" against Fenerbahce manager Jose Mourinho after claiming he made "racist statements" following the teams' 0-0 draw on Monday.
articles.title: Jose Mourinho: Galatasaray accuse Portuguese of making 'racist statements'

articles.description: Barry Ferguson is confident fans will see a Rangers team with greater "energy" and "a bit of desire" when he makes his debut as head coach against Kilmarnock on Wednesday.
articles.title: New boss Ferguson promises energy and desire from Rangers

articles.description: Double South Africa World Cup-winning prop Steven Kitshoff is forced to retire because of a serious neck injury.
articles.title: Steven Kitshoff: South Africa double World Cup winner retires with neck injury

articles.description: England captain Jos Buttler admits his future as captain may be on the line against Afghanistan in the Champions Trophy, but will continue to focus on the positives.
articles.title: Champions Trophy 2025: England captain Jos Buttler admits future as skipper on the line

articles.description: Two of Europe's heavyweights go head-to-head at Wembley on Wednesday in a repeat of the Women's World Cup final as England host world champions Spain.
articles.title: England v Spain: Women's World Cup finalists meet at Wembley in Women's Nations League

articles.description: Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim says his players must take some responsibility for the club's present financial predicament.
articles.title: Manchester United: Ruben Amorim says players must take responsibility for clubs financial issues

articles.description: England head coach Thomas Tuchel holds talks with Arsenal defender Ben White ahead of naming his first squad next month.
articles.title: Ben White: Thomas Tuchel holds talks with Arsenal defender over England future

articles.description: The battle to earn selection for the British and Irish Lions squad continued in the third round of the Six Nations, but who staked their claim?
articles.title: Lions watch: Finn Russell to start at fly-half? Maro Itoje for captain?

articles.description: Australia's game against South Africa in the Champions Trophy is abandoned without a ball being bowled because of persistent rain in Rawalpindi.
articles.title: Champions Trophy 2025 results: Australia-South Africa abandoned in Rawalpindi
